title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 28 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Will Cain, co-host of Fox & Friends Weekend, joins Clay and Buck to break down the top issues of the week: including Hawaii covid rules and Simone Biles drama at the Olympics. We now celebrate quitting. Cultural rot is a real threat to the nation. Biden heads to Pennsylvania to sell his $4.1 Trillion "infrastructure" bill. This spending is going to pour jet fuel over inflation. Supreme Court Justice Stephen Breyer resists pressure from the left to step down. San Diego County Board of Supervisors confronted about the "propaganda," that's coming from health officials. Emotional caller tells an amazing story about how sports shaped his life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
